titleInfo.title: Ext 4198/41 'Treatment of Iranian goods. at Assab.'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between HM Ambassador to Iran, the Foreign Office, the Government of India, External Affairs Department, and the Secretary of State for India, regarding the possible release or confiscation of a cargo of Iranian goods held at Assab, on account of the cargo's comprising guns and machinery that would be of use in manufacturing guns in India.A list of correspondence references contained in the file appears on the front cover.
